question: My husband has been complaining of nasal congestion for over a month.  He has tried every antihistime on on the market that is otc, and has been to the clinic multiple times complaining of the same symptoms.  He uses these sprays 4-8 times a day, even though he is overweight, has type 2 diabetes and extremely high blood pressure.  I have told him the the more he uses these sprays, the more congested he is going to get.  Am I right?
title: nasal congestion and antihistimines
